title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Introducing the KitchedAid 5, the ultimate baking companion! With over 20 stunning color variants, this durable metal mixer is not just a powerful tool but a stylish addition to your kitchen.

The KitchedAid 5 boasts an impressive capacity, able to handle up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. Its 59 touch points planetary mixing action ensures thorough and even mixing, making it perfect for a variety of baking needs.

This versatile mixer comes with a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield. The bowl is not only spacious but also comfortable to handle and dishwasher safe, making clean-up a breeze.

With its tilt-head design and 10-speed settings, the KitchedAid 5 offers unmatched precision and control. Plus, with over 10 optional hub-powered attachments available (sold separately), you can transform your KitchedAid 5 into a versatile kitchen assistant, capable of everything from pasta making to meat grinding.

Experience the joy of baking with the KitchedAid 5 - where functionality meets style!
